column1: Sources: National authorities and Fund staff estimates and projections.
1/ Non-tax revenues deviate from GFSM 2014 accounting with the exclusion of BCRA profit transfers. Non-tax revenues in 2022 include 0.3 percent of GDP income from
issuance of inflation linked debt securities. This income is excluded from revenues from 2023 onwards.
2/ Includes federal capital transfers to provinces.
3/ Deposit accumulation in 2022 largely reflects Federal Government deposits at the BCRA related to IMF purchases.
4/ Assumes repayment of Paris Club legacy obligations by 2028, consistent with the deal reached in October 2022.
5/ Includes Banco Nacion and other public entities.
7/ Corresponds to cash management operations of the non-financial public sector entities (-, deposits).
